actions.name: Swift Swim
actions.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Rainy Weather. The user is considered Water Type for the effects of Rainy Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user's SPD stat is increased by 50% and the user has +2 default SPD Stages in Rainy Weather. The user is considered Water Type for the effects of Rainy Weather.
